articles.title: 53 Brilliant Games For Laptops And Low-End PCs - Kotaku Australia
articles.description: Not everyone has a high-end rig for gaming. So here's our list of the best laptop games and best titles for low-end PCs.
articles.content: We all want to have the best gaming setup possible, but we can’t all afford thousand-dollar GPUs and 12-core monster PCs. Sometimes you’re a student stuck with a potato laptop, or you’re just getting… [+26586 chars]
